caption.p: ( A) Mean HSB tuber weight, ( B) number of tubers and ( C) mean tuber yield as affected by increased season water application at simulated natural precipitation patterns (50 and 200 mm) and at intensive agricultural environments (700 mm, drip irrigation and drip fertigation *); data were pooled from two different experiments conducted in the 2017â€“2018 season. Bars indicate standard deviation.
